title: [ASK] Iron Man The Movie Fonts
content:
Does anybody know what font is using as an official letter of "IRON MAN" at Iron Man The Movie poster ?

check this out: [http://www.impawards.com/2008/iron\_man\_ver3.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20130206142116/http:/www.impawards.com/2008/iron_man_ver3.html "http://www.impawards.com/2008/iron\_man\_ver3.html")

thanks,
author: vertical

comments.content:
"I don't know", some sort of Impact modified.

Off topic:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130206142116im_/http:/typophile.com/files/leaf_5432.gif)

Sláinte!

Back in:

I was dying... awaiting this Hero to come out at the screen. I can't wait to see it!!

looks like impact,  
but there is round shape on the top of letters :)

armada is quite similar, but it's not free :(

I am creating a new font called IronClad. The IronClad font is a IronMan font and it will be available this Friday, May 2, 2008 to coincide with the release of the new movie.

To preview the new Iron Man font (IronClad) please check out my website on Wednesday, April 30:

[David Occhino Design Website](http://web.archive.org/)

David Occhino  
David Occhino Design  
 [http://davidocchino.com/portfolio/typography](http://web.archive.org/web/20130206142116/http:/davidocchino.com/portfolio/typography "http://davidocchino.com/portfolio/typography")

Well, the name "IronClad" is already being used by Marvel Comics for another superhero. So if you come to my website looking for an Iron Man font, look for "Iron Hero." I hope you'll check it out.

David  
David Occhino Design  
 [http://davidocchino/com/portfolio/typography/iron-hero.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20130206142116/http:/davidocchino/com/portfolio/typography/iron-hero.html "http://davidocchino/com/portfolio/typography/iron-hero.html")
